item.title: Problems and solutions when upgrading XLC from 10.1 to IBM Open XL C/C++ for AIX 17.1.0
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: In this article, I would like to document the problems encountered when upgrading from IBM XLC 10.1 to XLC 17.1 (IBM Open XL C/C++ for AIX 17.1.0) and how to fix the following 12 errors.
